review_data.title: Food ok, service bad
review_data.content: Sushi is ok, although quite pricey, the preparation takes quite a lot of time, but the service is so bad and lacking of any kind of courtesy that the whole lunch experience comes with a bitter aftertaste. The man who attends is totally unfriendly and...More

review_data.title: Good Sushi
review_data.content: Small place centrally located. They have good sushi, good variety and good quality. For lunch they have some good sushi menu. Staff is friendly and efficient. Recommended for a quick bite at lunch.

review_data.title: Worse service ever
review_data.content: you get in there and you are attended by a man so unfriendly and arrogant and after a bad service even ask for tip. Beside the prices are too high for what they serve. Better stay away from this restaurant.

review_data.title: Average lunch

review_data.title: Almost Japanese, reasonably priced
review_data.content: The ownership changed and the food, although satisfying, is just average and plain. No real Japanese touch any more but an "almost" imitation. Ok for a reasonably priced lunch get the bento box.

review_data.title: Good Bento Boxes
review_data.content: I come here for lunch from time to time. The bento boxes are very nice and price-value is fine for the location. The service is quick and efficient.

review_data.title: Very fresh and good sashimi and rolls
review_data.content: I liked the food very much as it really appeared very fresh, was nicely presented and tasted very good. The service was polite and quick and I found the prices reasonable considering we're in Zurich.

review_data.title: Rude service, below average food
